We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AroonOscillator _aroon;
// In Initialize()
_aroon = AROON(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_aroon.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "AROON Aroon Up", _aroon.AroonUp);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AROON Aroon Down", _aroon.AroonDown);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AROON Current", _aroon.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.aroon = self.AROON(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.aroon.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AROON Aroon Up", self.aroon.AroonUp);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AROON Aroon Down", self.aroon.AroonDown);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AROON Current", self.aroon.Current);
